page.title: 19ROBIN HOOD FESTIVAL WEEK '85
page.content: On Saturday 2oth July the{Sherwood {Forester's Archery Club}took part in a {Silver Arrow tournament.}On Sunday{ {Jason Connery}the new{"Robin Hood" joined the rangers at the centre to welcome visitors.From 2.00 to 4.00 there was a{Jousting Tournament}on the cricket field.Tuesday there were{Pony {Club Games}and on Wednesday a day-long {Barbecue}with a{Medieval Banquet. On Thursday a{cricket match}between {Robin Hood's XI}and{Sheriff's XI}was followed by Saturday's{Avalon}with {strolling entertainers}and{Piggy Back {Jousting}at the{Major Oak.}On the Sunday there were decorated floats,the Maythorne Singers,the Antic Theatre, a day-long{barbecue}and{Fancy Dress}with prizes for the best{Robin Hood ,Maid {Marian,Friar Tuck,Little John,Will {Scarlet,Much the Miller's Son etc.. { }
